General.Name: Vector Capital PLC
General.Description: Vector Capital Plc, together with its subsidiaries, provides finance to the private and corporate sectors in the United Kingdom. It offers finance for land and property development, bridging loans, and secured business finance. The company was incorporated in 2019 and is based in Berkhamsted, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 13 Sovereign Park, London, United Kingdom, NW10 7QP
